definition: characterized by violence or bloodshed, a deep and vivid red color, to turn red, as if in embarrassment or shame
details:
adjective
- characterized by violence or bloodshed
= example: characterized by violence or bloodshed
= synonyms: red, violent
- of a color at the end of the color spectrum (next to orange)
= synonyms: red, reddish, ruddy, blood-red, carmine, cerise, cherry, cherry-red, ruby, ruby-red, scarlet
- (especially of the face) reddened or suffused with or as if with blood from emotion or exertion
= example: (especially of the face) reddened or suffused with or as if with blood from emotion or exertion
= synonyms: red, reddened, red-faced, flushed
noun
- a deep and vivid red color
= synonyms: ruby, deep red
verb
- to turn red, as if in embarrassment or shame
= synonyms: blush
